data.value: Clinically tested and dermatologist-approved, ensuring it's safe and gentle for everyday use.

Discover our palette of exquisitely simple and beautifully-crafted scents. Our fragrances are divided into six families, from fresh and uplifting citrus scents to opulent florals and warming woods. At Jo Malone London we’re proud of our British roots. Fragrances synonymous with Britain infuse our products and light up our imaginations, from dewy bluebells in a shaded woodland to the wild and windswept English Coast.
